                                          int instanceId)

      • addFileAsLocalResource

        public static void addFileAsLocalResource(FileSystem fs,
                                          Path destFilePath,
                                          LocalResourceType resourceType,
                                          Map<String,LocalResource> resourceMap)
                                   throws IOException
        Add a file as a Yarn LocalResource.
        Parameters:
        fs - a FileSystem instance
        destFilePath - the destination file path
        resourceType - the LocalResourceType of the file
        resourceMap - a Map of file names to their corresponding LocalResources
        Throws:
        IOException - if there's something wrong adding the file as a LocalResource
